name: Farmer's life (itch)
description:
Extra credits Jam n°3
Theme : Cycles
Genre : Survival Roguelike Farming/!\ WARNING : Due to lack of playtest with the latest build, you need to harvest you first tree before noon or you'll die of hunger, and so will your child !

You play a farmer that uses their apple trees to grow food, and to protect against werewolves.
Those tree use time to grow. For now there is only apple trees, but they were suppose to have different ones with different stats an behavior.
On the nights of a full moon werewolves come from the forest to attack the house.

“Hard times create strong men, strong man create good times, good times create weak men, weak men create hard times.” meme

Your farmer can die of old age or of hunger. Fortunately he procreates (implicit) as well. When you die you select an heir to you farm.

Depending on the amount of food you have at the birth of the child, he can be strong or weaker (speed, selfishness). Unfortunately not implemented yet so you'll have to imagine.

Seasonal cycles : Spring/Summer/Autumn/Winter
Day/Night cycle : Sun, and sleep cycle
Lunar cycles : Full moon => werewolves
Life/Death cycle : roguelike element

HOW TO PLAY : Click on a hole to plant a tree, click on a tree to harvest it.
